title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1848/97 of 25 September 1997 fixing the maximum moisture content of cereals offered for intervention in certain Member States during the 1997/98 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1848/97 of 25 September 1997 fixing the maximum moisture content of cereals offered for intervention in certain Member States during the 1997/98 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Member States listed in the Annex hereto are hereby authorized to fix a maximum moisture content of 15 % for cereals listed therein and offered for intervention during the 1997/98 marketing year.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 July 1997.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
